original_text: And the Lord was with Judah; and he drave out the inhabitants of the mountain; but could not drive out the inhabitants of the valley, because they had chariots of iron.
korean_text: 여호와께서 유다와 함께 계셨으므로 그가 산지 주민을 쫓아내었으나 골짜기의 주민들은 철 병거가 있으므로 그들을 쫓아내지 못하였으며

sentences.original_text: And the Lord was with Judah
and he drave out the inhabitants of the mountain
but could not drive out the inhabitants of the valley
because they had chariots of iron
